repos.title: StatiCat
blurb: A custom Discord bot developed in Python featuring various technologies including http requests, html scraping, image manipulation, at-runtime module loading, advanced class creation, and custom decorators.

repos.title: DuckyLighting
blurb: A standalone Python project that controls the by-key lighting of a Ducky One2 RGB keyboard.
• Reverse-engineered Duckyâ€™s USB protocol for lighting up the board by individual keys.
• Utilizes a distribution of HIDAPI with a modified version of python-easyhid (C wrapper).
• Utilizes custom wrappers and metaclasses to organize effect layers in a lighting configuration.
